sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Bar
        :chart-options="chartOptions"
        :chart-data="chartData"
        :chart-id="chartId"
        :dataset-id-key="datasetIdKey"
        :plugins="plugins"
        :css-classes="cssClasses"
        :styles="styles"
        :width="width"
        :height="height"
    />
</template>

<script>
    import { Bar } from "vue-chartjs";
    import {Chart as ChartJS, Title,Tooltip,Legend, BarElement, CategoryScale, LinearScale, } from "chart.js";

    ChartJS.register(Title, Tooltip, Legend, BarElement, CategoryScale, LinearScale );

    export default {
        name: "BarChart",
        components: { Bar },
        props: {
            chartId: {
                type: String,
                default: "bar-chart",
            },
            datasetIdKey: {
                type: String,
                default: "label",
            },
            width: {
                type: Number,
                default: 400,
            },
            height: {
                type: Number,
                default: 300,
            },
            cssClasses: {
                default: "",
                type: String,
            },
            plugins: {
                type: Object,
                default: () => {},
            },
        },
        data() {
            return {
                styles:{
                    height: '100%'
                },
                chartData :{
                labels: ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July'],
                datasets: [
                    {
                        label: 'Data One',
                        backgroundColor: '#f87979',
                        data: [40, 39, 10, 40, 39, 80, 40]
                    },
                    {
                        label: 'Data two',
                        backgroundColor: '#0451a4',
                        data: [40, 39, 10, 40, 39, 80, 40]
                    }
                ]
            },
                chartOptions: {
                    responsive: true,
                    maintainAspectRatio: false
                },
            };
        },
    };



</script>
